"By the cords of tender love and sympathy the Lord linked all men to Himself. Of us He says, Ye 'are 
                                                                           26
laborers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.' This relationship we should recognize. If we are bound up with Christ, we shall constantly manifest Christ-like sympathy and forbearance toward those who are striving with all their God-given ability to bear their burdens, even as we endeavor to bear our appointed burdens.
